prompts: Create a ghostly knight Pokemon with a sword and shield, shimmering in golden and purple hues.
Design a regal-looking Pokemon with a unique shield and sword, showcasing a mix of silver and violet colors.
Imagine a majestic Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a warrior, featuring a flowing cape and a striking color palette.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a ghostly figure holding a sword, adorned in elegant shades of gold and purple.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines armor and spectral elements, using a blend of light and dark colors.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a noble guardian, featuring a tall, slender body with a shiny shield.
Give me an armored Pokemon with dual forms, showcasing its strength through intricate designs and colors.
